name: Thrown Back (V)
Lore: 'Being sent to dispose of two Jedi is the battle droid equivalent of a really bad day at the office.',
Text: 'Deploy on table.  [Permanent weapon] and [Maintenance] cards do not add battle destiny draws.  During battle, neither player may add more than two destiny to power (or total power) or one destiny to total attrition.  Once per turn, may place a card from hand in Used Pile. (Immune to Alter.)',
